content.p: We are happy to accept group bookings from colleges, universities or other providers on a single or multiple test dates. We will do our best to accommodate any specific requirements. Email us at ielts@nottingham.ac.uk. Our centre provides tests at least twice a month but demand can be very high, particularly at certain times of the year. We therefore advise you to contact us well in advance to ensure we can fully meet your needs. B Floor, Exchange Building Jubilee Campus, Wollaton Road Nottingham, NG8 1AW, UK t: +44 (0) 115 951 4419 email: ielts@nottingham.ac.uk
